about_the_game:
So, This Vampire Walks into a Bar is a visual novel, where the choices you make as a new bartender affect the way you are treated by the patrons. Be warned, some of your decisions can have… disastrous consequences.

Frankie’s Lair is an eclectic bar with a steady group of regulars, who are even more eccentric. These patrons have stories to tell if you can handle their special needs.

You play as a college student, desperate for a job after an unfortunate accident at their previous one. With a minimal amount of on job training, it is up to you to make sure the customers are satisfied and there are no mishaps.

This game features:
  • Digitally drawn 2d art and original character design
  • A mixology mini-game
  • Fully fleshed out characters with interesting backstories and varied taste
  • At least one monster

content_descriptors.notes: Please be aware that, with certain decisions, there may be implied violence, drug use, and death. As this is staged inside a bar, there most certainly will be drinking and maybe a magic potion or two.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2

name: So, This Vampire Walks into a Bar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: Join our broke protagonist Jackie, who, after a workplace accident, will never look the same again. Jackie desperately tries to make ends meet by working in an unusual bar, despite having no experience at all!
